name: Wizard Platformer (Cornil Patidar)
description:
I created this game to revise few topics of 2D game designing and feel more confident about it.  There is no ending in the game yet, maybe I will complete it in future.  

• Controls :-   

  1. Move - W A S D 
  2. Jump - Space button 
  3. Attack - Left Mouse Button 
  4. Dash - Right Mouse Button
